```lisp
[
  (:action cluster ; Cluster a resource and update its status
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?resource - entity ?clustered_entity - entity)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (clustered ?clustered_entity))
                    (found ?resource)
                  )
    :effect (clustered ?clustered_entity)
  ),

  (:action get ; Get a resource and update the collected status
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?resource - entity)
    :precondition (not (collected ?resource))
    :effect (collected ?resource)
  ),

  (:action start_fire
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?camp - camp ?ts - teepee_structure)
    :precondition (and
                    (clustered grass_tinder)
                    (not (fire_started ?camp))
                  )
    :effect (fire_started ?camp)
  ),

  (:action break_branch
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?tree - tree ?branch - branch)
    :precondition (and
                    (strong ?npc)
                    (attached ?branch ?tree)
                  )
    :effect (and
              (not (attached ?branch ?tree))
            )
  ),

  (:action start
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?target - entity ?context - entity)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (state_changed ?context))
                    (appropriate_conditions ?actor ?target ?context)
                  )
    :effect (state_changed ?context)
  ),

  (:action break_branch
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?b - bush ?bp - branch_piece)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (broken ?bp))
                    (intact ?b)
                  )
    :effect (and
              (broken ?bp)
              (not (intact ?b))
            )
  ),

  (:action build_teepee
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?bp - branch_piece ?t - teepee)
    :precondition (and
                    (collected ?bp)
                    (not (built ?t))
                  )
    :effect (and
              (built ?t)
              (not (collected ?bp))
            )
  ),

  (:action break
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?target - object ?result - object)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (broken ?result))
                    (intact ?target)
                  )
    :effect (and
              (broken ?result)
              (not (intact ?target))
            )
  ),

  (:action build
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?camp - camp ?item - object ?structure - structure_type)
    :precondition (and
                    (or (broken_branch ?item) (collected ?item) (fire_started ?camp))
                    (not (built ?structure))
                  )
    :effect (and
              (built ?structure)
              (or (shelter_built ?camp) (cooking ?npc ?camp))
            )
  ),

  (:action burn ; Burn a combustible item to prepare or transform it
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - combustible)
    :precondition (not (burned ?item))
    :effect (burned ?item)
  ),

  (:action collect ; Collect a resource and update its status
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?resource - entity)
    :precondition (not (collected ?resource))
    :effect (collected ?resource)
  )
]
```
